sources.title: The Night Holds Terror (1955) Vince Edwards, John Cassavetes, Jack Kelly, Hildy Parks
sources.description: The Night Holds Terror is a 1955 American crime FILM NOlR based on a true incident , written and directed by Andrew L. Stone and starring Vince Edwards, John Cassavetes, Jack Kelly and Hildy Parks.   You can find out more about this movie from Wikipedia and there is also a review from the movie blog Martin Teller’s Movie Reviews .

sources.title: The Night Holds Terror (1955)
sources.description: A group of escaped convicts holds a household prisoner as the police close in. Watch on RetroFlix.org:  https://retroflix.org/the-night-holds-terror-1955/

sources.title: 1955 - The Night Holds Terror - Andrew L. Stone - VOSE

metadata.Plot: A group of escaped convicts take over a suburban home to evade the ongoing police manhunt, making the lives of the family living there a nightmare. The longer the men stay there, the more the tensions build and the more likely it becomes a tragedy will occur. Based on a real-life hostage-taking.
metadata.Actors: Jack Kelly, Hildy Parks, Vince Edwards
